entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
